title: Lake Roosevelt National Recreation Area: Ranger Guided
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Plan A Field Trip     Ranger Guided                 Ranger Guided       With its diverse resources, Lake Roosevelt has a lot to offer educators who would like to supplement their classroom lessons with excursions into the field or practical examples from the natural or cultural world. Though the current, formal educational offerings at Lake Roosevelt NRA are limited, we hope you and your students enjoy them. The following programs are available in Spring 2015 and for the 2015-16 school year. Landforms In the Sand Land of Many Opportunists If you are interested in spring programs contact the park's education specialist. Use the reservation form to arrange a program or contact our education specialist for more information.
